description:
These long johns features 98% merino wool and 2% Creora Eco Soft Elastic for maximum breathability, odor resistance and flexibility for those active days.

We have finally launched our Scandinavian Luxury base-layers. We have used our favorite yarn from Südwolle, the Nm 1/60, 98% super fine merino wool, 17,5 microns, and added 2% Creora-Eco-Soft, to make the fabric stretchy. The single jersey also makes the fabric light and breathable, it almost feels like a second layer of skin. These long johns have a fitted shape with flatlock seams for more comfort.

We can also recommend using these underneath suit pants on cold days, as it is very light and breathable. All of our SNØ pieces comes in a box that we have tried to keep as simple and minimalistic as possible, so that you can use it as a small storage box.
name: We Norwegians Sno Long Johns - Mens
